title: 90/163/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 March 1990 amending Decision 86/77/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 March 1990
amending Decision 86/77/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts
(Only the English text is authentic)
(90/163/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
With effect from 1 January 1990, the following humanitarian organizations are added to the Annex of Decision 86/77/EEC:
'Kent and Sussex aid to Poland
Plumbline Ministries
Battle Baptist Church
The Cheldon Christian Trust
The Romanian Aid Fund Limited
Association of Ukranian Women in Great Britain'.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 March 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 164, 24. 6. 1985, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 182, 3. 7. 1987, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 310, 21. 11. 1985, p. 9.
(4) OJ No L 151, 3. 6. 1989, p. 24.
(5) OJ No L 76, 21. 3. 1986, p. 54.
(6) OJ No L 189, 4. 7. 1989, p. 47.
